nodes.description: 警方在奥斯陆实施大规模封锁
nodes.support_text: Even as the police locked down a large area of the city after the blasts

nodes.description: 伪装成警察的嫌疑人进入乌托亚岛青年营地
nodes.support_text: the suspect, dressed as a police officer, entered the youth camp on the island of Utoya

nodes.description: 嫌疑人谎称例行检查实施恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: He said it was a routine check in connection with the terror attack in Oslo

nodes.description: 至少80人遇害，包括16岁以下青少年
nodes.support_text: Of the at least 80 people killed on the island

nodes.description: 受惊青年跳入水中逃生，因岛屿远离大陆难以撤离
nodes.support_text: Terrified youths jumped into the water to escape

nodes.description: 袭击者先在岛上开枪，随后对水中逃生的受害者继续射击
nodes.support_text: He first shot people on the island, after which he started shooting people in the water

nodes.description: 15岁幸存者证实袭击者分阶段实施屠杀
nodes.support_text: He first shot people on the island

nodes.description: Bjorn Jarle Roberg-Larsen通过电话与岛上的青少年交谈
nodes.support_text: Bjorn Jarle Roberg-Larsen通过电话与岛上的青少年交谈
Kids have started to swim...scared to death.
